result.reason: Multi-level inheritance chain is broken: TryGetInheritedPropertyValue stops at the immediate parent's raw value without checking if that parent also has inheritance enabled for the same property, so grandparent values are never reached for non-credential properties.
result.approach: In TryGetInheritedPropertyValue, after reading the parent's raw property value, check if that parent's Inheritance also has that property enabled; if so, continue walking up the chain instead of returning the intermediate (uninherited) value.

attempts.raw_output:
Based on my analysis of the inheritance system in `ConnectionInfo.cs`, the `TryGetInheritedPropertyValue` method walks the parent chain but only skips ahead for credential properties with empty values — for all other properties it stops at the immediate parent even if that parent also has inheritance enabled for the same property. This breaks multi-level inheritance chains (Child → Folder A → Folder B where Folder A also inherits).

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Multi-level inheritance chain is broken: TryGetInheritedPropertyValue stops at the immediate parent's raw value without checking if that parent also has inheritance enabled for the same property, so grandparent values are never reached for non-credential properties.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs"],"approach":"In TryGetInheritedPropertyValue, after reading the parent's raw property value, check if that parent's Inheritance also has that property enabled; if so, continue walking up the chain instead of returning the intermediate (uninherited) value."}
```
